item.name: Authentication

request.description: Authenticate as an admin to get the authorization token required for accessing the tax return APIs. The token will be automatically saved to the environment variables.

item.description: Authentication endpoints to get the admin token required for API access.

item.name: Individual Tax Return APIs

query.description: Sort order (ASC or DESC, default: DESC)

request.description:
Get all individual tax returns with filtering and search functionality. This endpoint supports:

- Pagination with page and limit parameters
- Filtering by tax year
- Searching by email or phone
- Sorting by various fields

Returns a paginated list of tax returns with basic information and user details, plus pagination metadata.

Requires admin authentication.

response.name: Successful Response Example

item.name: Get Individual Tax Return By ID

request.description:
Get a complete individual tax return by ID with all associated data from all tabs:

- User information
- Basic information tab
- Personal information tab
- FBR information tab
- Income sources and details
- Tax deductions from all categories
- Tax benefits and credits
- Wealth statement

This comprehensive endpoint returns all data needed for detailed viewing of a tax return.

Requires admin authentication.

response.name: Successful Response Example
response.body:
{
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Individual tax return retrieved successfully",
    "data": {

item.description: API endpoints for individual tax returns management.

formdata.description: File to upload (image, PDF, document, etc.)

request.description: Upload a file (image, PDF, document, etc.) to the server. Returns a URL to access the uploaded file.
